segments.text: What ’ s your major weak point ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t been involved in international business , so I don ’ t have any experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does your present employer know you are looking for another job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t discussed my career plan with my present employer , but I am sure he will understand .
segments.speaker: S2
